original_text: This is what the Lord said to me: ‘I will watch quietly from my place. I will work quietly, like the heat that comes from the sun. I will be as quiet as the mist that comes at harvest time.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 내가 나의 처소에서 조용히 감찰함이 쬐이는 일광 같고 가을 더위에 운무 같도다

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord said to me:
I will watch quietly from my place.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 자리에서 조용히 지켜볼 것이다.

sentences.original_text: like the heat that comes from the sun.
I will be as quiet as the mist
